verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to her who is <S%H4754>rebellious<s%> and <S%H1351>polluted,<s%> the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%>

She <S%H8085>didn't<s%> obey the <S%H6963>voice.<s%> She <S%H3947>didn't<s%> receive <S%H4148>correction.<s%> She <S%H982>didn't<s%> trust in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> She <S%H7126>didn't<s%> draw near to her <S%H430>God.<s%>

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her are <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lions.<s%> Her <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves.<s%> They leave <S%H1633>nothing<s%> until the next <S%H1242>day.<s%>

Her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H6348>arrogant<s%> and <S%H900>treacherous<s%> <S%H582>people.<s%> Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> They have done <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6662>her,<s%> is righteous. He will <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5766>wrong.<s%> <S%H1242>Every<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> he <S%H5414>brings<s%> his <S%H4941>justice<s%> to <S%H216>light.<s%> He <S%H5737>doesn't<s%> fail, but the <S%H5767>unjust<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> no <S%H1322>shame.<s%>

I have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Their <S%H6438>battlements<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate.<s%> I have made their <S%H2351>streets<s%> <S%H2717>waste,<s%> so that no one passes <S%H5674>by.<s%> Their <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6658>destroyed,<s%> so that there is no <S%H376>man,<s%> so that there is no <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Just <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3947>me.<s%> Receive <S%H4148>correction,<s%> so that her <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> <S%H3772>won't<s%> be cut off, <S%H834>according<s%> to all that I have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> concerning <S%H403>her.<s%>" But they rose <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> all their <S%H5949>doings.<s%>

"Therefore <S%H2442>wait<s%> for <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I rise <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H5706>prey,<s%> for my <S%H4941>determination<s%> is to <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that I may <S%H6908>assemble<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to <S%H8210>pour<s%> on them my <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> even all my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> for all the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

For then I <S%H2015>will<s%> <S%H1305>purify<s%> the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> that they may all <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him <S%H259>shoulder<s%> to <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>

From <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> my <S%H6282>worshipers,<s%> even the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H6327>dispersed<s%> <S%H2986>people,<s%> will bring my <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> you will not be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> for all your <S%H5949>doings,<s%> in which you have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against <S%H5493>me;<s%> for then I will take away out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you your <S%H1346>proudly<s%> <S%H5947>exulting<s%> <S%H3254>ones,<s%> and you will no more be <S%H1361>haughty<s%> in my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

But I will <S%H7604>leave<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you an <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they will take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> nor <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> neither will a <S%H8649>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> for they will <S%H7462>feed<s%> and lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> and no one will make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>"

<S%H7442>Sing,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> <S%H7321>Shout,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> with all your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has taken <S%H5493>away<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments.<s%> He has thrown <S%H6437>out<s%> your <S%H341>enemy.<s%> The <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7200>you.<s%> You will not be afraid of evil any <S%H7451>more.<s%>
In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> it will be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid, <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> <S%H3027>Don't<s%> let your hands be <S%H7503>weak.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H1368>you,<s%> a mighty one who will <S%H3467>save.<s%> He will <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over you with <S%H8057>joy.<s%> He will <S%H2790>calm<s%> you in his <S%H160>love.<s%> He will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> over you with <S%H7440>singing.<s%>
I will <S%H622>remove<s%> those who <S%H3013>grieve<s%> about the appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%> from <S%H4864>you.<s%> They are a burden and a reproach to <S%H2781>you.<s%>

<S%H6256>Behold,<s%> at that time I will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with all those who <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3467>you,<s%> and I will save those who are <S%H6760>lame,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> those who were driven <S%H5080>away.<s%> I will <S%H7760>give<s%> them <S%H8416>praise<s%> and <S%H8034>honor,<s%> whose <S%H1322>shame<s%> has been in all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H6256>in,<s%> and at that time will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H5414>you;<s%> for I will give you <S%H8034>honor<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%> among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> when I <S%H7725>restore<s%> your <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
